name: FULL ASMR TEST - FIXED ROW NUMBER
description: Fixed N8N Google Sheets row positioning issue by correcting row_number schema type from 'string' to 'number' in all Google Sheets nodes. Applied PR #16632 fix.
fixes_applied: Changed row_number schema type from 'string' to 'number' in Update Sheet with Prompts node
Changed row_number schema type from 'string' to 'number' in Final Sheet Update node
Changed row_number schema type from 'string' to 'number' in Final Video Update node
Preserved row_number logic across all workflow nodes
Applied N8N PR #16632 fix for Google Sheets row_number type handling
problem_solved: Data was being written to wrong rows (previous row instead of pending row) due to incorrect row_number type handling
research_sources: GitHub PR #16632: Fix row_number type handling in Google Sheets nodes

Official N8N documentation on Google Sheets integration
